predicate.note: Frames file for 'pirate' based on sentences in wsj. Verbnet entry 10.5, Framenet entry Piracy. Go figger.

roleset.name: be a pirate, steal

example.name: the one example
example.text: Any secret can be pirated [*-1], the experts said, if it is transmitted over the air.
example.arg: if it is transmitted over the air

roleset.note: The arg structure is predicted by class membership, but because of the limited meaning of the verb, I doubt arg0 or arg2 would ever appear.
